description: Mentioned by Ptolemy, the Pyr(r)on Pedion is generally considered to be unlocated, but BAtlDir offers that it may correspond to the modern Gharb (Rharb) plain in Morocco.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Gharb plain?

properties.title: OSM Location: cercle de Gharb - Bni Malek
